title: athincoming
author: athincoming
content: About Ath Incoming the ultimate all time high tool By tracking new and current tokens on the ATH network, this brings with it a whole new agenda and focuses on the important factors which include but are not limited to volume and how often a token breaks its previous all time high. Everyone in crypto is obsessed with healthy charts and high volume, bringing all these factors together Ath Incoming offers services that are unique and innovative in their delivery but most importantly sought after.How many times have you came across the sentence 'ath incoming' its a name that rings in all crypto enthusiasts ears, when the climb begins its everywhere this is where the inspiration came from and its where our focus as a token shall stand.Ath Tools The ultimate package for the ultimate investorThe AthIncomingBot is a telegram bot used to track a tokens previous, current and new All Time High data and much more using the power of AI.Features include but are not limited to the following...Ath TrendingNew All Time High NotificationsProvides Volume, Percentage To All Time High, MarketCap DataAllows For Ranking & AdvertisementRecords valuable data! AI Xplorer is a clean and intelligent chart and portfolio management application which aims to improve on existing DEXs in several ways.Features include but are not limited to the following...Smart Charting By AIAuto profit, cut lossOutcome Recommendations powered by AIPortfolio ManagementRisk AnalyserTrending & AdvertisementAth Key NFT Holders of a Ath Key NFT have access to all Ath Incoming has to offer, being in the elite club aint easy as they are extremely limited and offer great passive income.Features include but are not limited to the following...Share of 2% of all volume from $ATH ( paid fortnightly in USDT )Share of 10% of all ad and trending revenuePremium access to AI XplorerAccess to Ath VIP chat, be first to know (minimum hold required)7 days free ad space (every 6 months)RevenueHow does Ath Tools benefit the ath incoming token?The answer is quite simple, with every service provided by Ath Tools there is a fee charged for services, trending and even advertisement all revenue generated will be fed back into the Ath Incoming token. This will be in the form of buying back the token and then sending those tokens to burn, a percentage of revenue will also be fed back to our Ath Key holders please head over to www.athincoming.com to find out more!
